title: RedirectPlus v2.3 - Premium WordPress Plugins
description:
Excellent Wordpress plugin to detect mobile devices and redirect to the mobile site with Redirect count chart for different device. You can also choose whether or not to redirect tablets by enabling or disabling the check-box option. Also there are option for individual platform redirect like iPhone, Android, Windows Phone. Contains external links.

To install:
1. Upload the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
